A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Boring from start to finish. The only character with any development is Kylo Ren and the movie is just downright cringeworthy and ridiculous in many places. And logic was completely thrown out the window with things such as the character of Luke and Leia's abilities. The vast majority of sub plots were nothing but wasted time and often bogged down by an obvious agenda of social commentary. You could cut everyone out of this movie but Rey\, Luke and Kylo\, and so long as there were some extras running around it'd be the same ending. Also Snoke might as well have never existed.
